td.content: Discharged to Home or Self Care

translation.displayName: Vital signs, weight, height, head circumference, oximetry, BMI, and BSA panel - HL7.CCDAr1.1

td.paragraph:
12 day supply of anticoagulants to aid recovery
Tylenol recommended to manage pain. Follow up with Dr. Fleming if this is not working.
Monitor for signs of infection
Patient to follow physical therapy and exercise routine as discussed
Follow up with Dr. Fleming in one month

tr.td: take 8 tablets by mouth once daily

Tylenol Cool Caplet Extra Strength 500 mg oral tablet 1 unit(s) orally once a day, As Needed Quantity: 10 Refills: 0 Ordered: 8-Jul-2016 Config, SCM Start: 22-Jun-2015 End: 2-Jul-2015 Generic Substitution Allowed Comments: This product contains acetaminophen. Do not use with any other product containing acetaminophen to prevent possible liver damage.

td.content: This product contains acetaminophen. Do not use with any other product containing acetaminophen to prevent possible liver damage.

tr.td: cefTRIAXone 10 g injection 1 unit(s) injectable 2 times a day Quantity: 1 Refills: 0 Ordered: 8-Jul-2016 Config, SCM Start: 22-Jun-2015 End: 30-Jun-2015 Generic Substitution Allowed
1 ml darbepoetin alfa 0.5 mg/ml prefilled syringe (1 source.)

Aranesp SingleJect 500 mcg/mL injectable solution 1 unit(s) injectable once a week Quantity: 1 Refills: 0 Ordered: 8-Jul-2016 Config, SCM Start: 22-Jun-2015 Generic Substitution Allowed Comments: It is very important that you take or use this exactly as directed. Do not skip doses or discontinue unless directed by your doctor.Keep in refrigerator. Do not freeze.

td.content: It is very important that you take or use this exactly as directed. Do not skip doses or discontinue unless directed by your doctor.Keep in refrigerator. Do not freeze.

tr.td: The lungs are clear. The heart is enlarged with evidence of cardiomegaly.Pulmonary vasculature is normal. The aorta is mildly ectatic and tortuous.IMPRESSION: Cardiomegaly. No other acute abnormality.
